title: My Ethernet won't stay connect
body:
My Ethernet work just fine, but whenever I play League, my Ethernet would drop or not stay connect or lost connection or whatever you would call it

I will be able to play 1 or 2 game of League and then boom, connection lost.
-----------
I have no problem using my internet with wifi but wifi give me ping that fly all over the place so I switch to Ethernet  but now I'm having trouble with not being able to stay connected with the internet and this mostly happen when I play League only. 

So I assume this would be a problem a rioter could help me out

replies.body:
For some reason, it seems like your network is having a hard time communicating with our servers regardless of if you use wifi or ethernet. Since ethernet doesn't seem to help at all, this might have more to do with your settings rather than your internet. 

Look over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if those adjustments help you stayed connected!

Yeah, I've already submitted a ticket 

Already been told to do a malware to check on my virus and a LoL log zip to reply in

You're in good hands with our tech agents! Keep talking to them through your ticket and I'm sure you'll be back on the Rift in no time.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I'm not just sitting around and waiting to get my issue fix 

I actually did some research and I think I got my issue fixed but I still want to hear from them if they have a different solution in case the issue pop up again
